title: Mansfield Rugby Club
text:
Mansfield Rugby Club is an <a href="England">English</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> team based in <a href="Mansfield">Mansfield</a>, <a href="Nottinghamshire">Nottinghamshire</a>. The club runs four senior sides, a colts team and eleven junior sides. The first XV currently plays in <a href="Midlands%203%20East%20%28North%29">Midlands 3 East (North)</a>, a sixth tier league in the <a href="English%20rugby%20union%20system">English rugby union system</a>.
History.
Mansfield Rugby Club was formed in 1956 and by 1977 the club had bought its own ground at Eakring Road. The club was placed in <a href="Midlands%201">Midlands 1</a> when the league system was introduced in 1987. A reorganisation of the leagues resulted in the club moving to <a href="Midlands%202%20East">Midlands 2 East</a> but Mansfield has since gained two promotions, moving into National 3 Midlands in 2011. However recent seasons have seen several relegations and the club is now playing at a level similar to where the club was a decade earlier.
